name: Vo Thi Thanh Ngan
headerTaglineFour: based in Ho Chi Minh City.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: Building responsive, user-friendly web interfaces with modern frameworks like React.js and Typescript.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Creating high-performance, cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter.

aboutpara: Aspiring Frontend Developer passionate about creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces for both web and mobile applications. Seeking opportunities to apply modern frameworks (React, Typescript, Flutter) and grow in a collaborative development environment.

resume.description: Experienced in building optimized user experiences. Well-versed with React, Javascript, Typescript, and other popular web frameworks.

bullets: Developed a full-featured realtime chat application supporting one-to-one and group conversations, enabling users to share text, voice messages, videos, images, and file attachments.
Engineered a dynamic user experience with features like realtime notifications, online/offline presence status, typing indicators, and the ability to delete or recall messages.
Integrated Gemini AI to power an intelligent chatbot, providing users with an interactive and helpful AI assistant to enhance engagement.
Developed a cross-platform e-commerce application for computer hardware, focusing on a high-performance, user-centric shopping experience.
Engineered advanced product discovery functionalities, including multi-attribute filtering, sorting, and a dynamic shopping cart with real-time updates.
Built a comprehensive admin dashboard for centralized management of products, users, and orders, complete with data visualization for tracking key business metrics.
Architected and developed a microservice-based Student Management System designed to streamline academic advising, grade tracking, and class administration.
Implemented a secure, role-based access control (RBAC) system providing distinct portals and permissions for Administrators, Academic Advisors, and Students.
Built a student-facing portal enabling users to securely view their academic progress, access course information, and participate in class forums with email notifications.
